text: Nell is a 1994 American drama movie directed by Michael Apted. The movie stars Jodie Foster (who also produced it) as Nell Kellty, a young woman who has lived away from people her entire life in an isolated cabin with her mother, in the forests of the Appalachian Mountains in North Carolina. When her elderly mother suddendly dies, she has to face other people for the first time in her life. Liam Neeson, Natasha Richardson, Richard Libertini, and Nick Searcy have supporting roles. The movie is based on Mark Handley's play Idioglossia. Nell was released in December 1994. The movie reviews were mixed, however the movie was successful at the box office. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1994 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Apted Category:Movies composed by Mark Isham Category:Movies set in North Carolina Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies about language
title: Nell (movie)
